entity1.name: supernatural
entity1.description: A category of phenomena that are considered to be beyond scientific explanation and often associated with the paranormal or spiritual.

entity7.name: popular culture
entity7.description: The set of practices, beliefs, and objects that are dominant or prevalent in a society, widely accessible, and often disseminated by the media.

entity8.name: movies
entity8.description: A series of moving images, usually accompanied by sound, presented on a screen for entertainment or educational purposes.

entity9.name: TV shows
entity9.description: Television programs that are broadcast in regular intervals and can be either fictional or non-fictional.

entity10.name: books
entity10.description: Written works or compositions published in print or electronic form, often containing stories, information, or ideas.

entity11.name: ghost stories

entity12.name: supernatural
entity12.description: Phenomena that are not subject to the laws of nature and cannot be explained by scientific means, often associated with spiritual or paranormal activities.

entity18.name: unexplained noises
entity18.description: Sounds that cannot be attributed to known sources and are often associated with paranormal activity.

entity19.name: presence

entity20.name: skeptics

entity22.name: Psychological factors

entity24.name: unknown
entity24.description: A situation or thing that is not known about or familiar to someone.

entity25.name: immortality

entity26.name: spiritual realm

entity34.description: A set of shared attitudes, values, goals, and practices that characterize a group or society.

entity35.name: supernatural occurrences

entity37.name: paranormal

entity38.name: spirits
